root.name: Legacy of Ys: Books I & II
root.description: These remakes of Ys I II feature new additions to the core gameplay mechanics.Eight way directional movement - Adol can now move diagonally, allowing for greater maneuverability over the TGCD version.Stylus controls - a new way to play using the standard bump-based battle system, and allows for quicker field navigation.D-Pad controls - the standard control scheme, that now allows players to actively swing Adol's sword, and also gives them more refined movement.Improved localization - handled by the staff at Atlus USA, Ys I II receive a clean and accurate English translation.Expanded story sequences - additional areas and characters have been added in from Ys Eteranal.Vaguex-Vardette - a brand new area exclusive to the DS remakes, which also includes a whole new equipment set.
